word:
I am sorry that I have not more literary help. . . . It is of no use to expect anything from Marian until the life of Christ is completed. . . . But the question is, Where shall I find such an one? . . . I write many pages before breakfast. I rise in the morning at two, three, and four o'clock.--Letter 41, 1895, pp. 1, 2, 4. (To Dr. J. H. Kellogg, October 25, 1895.) 


                                   -185-
